import React from "react"; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import ButtonGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ButtonGroup'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import {Image} from 'react-bootstrap'; const Book = (props) => { return ( { (props.data.image || props.data.imageLinks) ? : No image provided by Google Books. } {props.data.title} {props.data.subtitle}
{"Written By " + props.data.authors}
{props.data.description || "No description provided by Google Books."}
{props.page === "search" ? : }
); } export default Book;
